post.text: Tomorrow, we have the chance to stand up for the America we believe in. Share this if you're voting. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: I am with her because it is the smartest choice! I am with the best person for this position! I am voting for the one person for all People in America! I am voting for ary Clinton! Oh wait, I did that already! hahha The only choice!
